description: Questioning your abilities, second-guessing yourself. Let's build trust.

art.title: Self-Trust Symbol Art
art.instruction: Create symbols representing times you trusted yourself and it worked out well.
art.affirmation: I trust myself and my ability to make good decisions

art.title: Inner Wisdom Portrait
art.instruction: Draw your wise inner self who knows your true capabilities and worth.
art.affirmation: I listen to my inner wisdom and trust its guidance

art.title: Doubt Dissolving Light
art.instruction: Draw doubt as dark clouds, then bright light dissolving them into clear sky.
art.affirmation: Light of self-knowledge dissolves the clouds of doubt

breathwork.title: Trust-Building Breath
breathwork.instruction: Breathe in self-trust, breathe out self-doubt. Build trust with each breath cycle.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe in trust and exhale all doubt about my capabilities

breathwork.title: Inner Knowing Breath
breathwork.instruction: Breathe into your gut/intuition. Trust the wisdom that lives below your thinking mind.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe into my inner knowing and trust my intuitive wisdom

somatic.title: Confident Decision Posture
somatic.instruction: Practice the posture of someone who trusts their decisions - upright, grounded, alert.
somatic.affirmation: I embody the posture of someone who trusts their inner wisdom

somatic.title: Gut Wisdom Connection
somatic.instruction: Place hands on belly, breathe into your gut instincts. Connect to body wisdom.
somatic.affirmation: I trust my gut wisdom and body's intuitive knowledge

cbt.title: Self-Doubt Evidence Examination
cbt.instruction: Examine evidence for and against your self-doubting thoughts. Often doubt lacks evidence.
cbt.affirmation: I examine doubt with curiosity and find evidence of my capabilities

rebt.title: Certainty Demand Challenge
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'I must be certain before I act.' Practice acting with reasonable confidence.
rebt.affirmation: I act with reasonable confidence even without perfect certainty

neural.title: Self-Trust Installation
neural.instruction: Install memories of trusting yourself successfully. Build self-trust neural pathways.
neural.affirmation: I naturally trust myself and my decision-making abilities

journaling.title: Self-Trust Evidence Journal
journaling.instruction: Write about times you trusted yourself and it worked out. Build evidence of your trustworthiness.
journaling.affirmation: I have abundant evidence that I can trust myself

eft.title: Self-Doubt Release Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I doubt myself, I choose to trust my capabilities and inner wisdom.'
eft.affirmation: I release doubt and choose trust in my natural wisdom

emdr.title: Wise Decision Memory Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of making wise decisions through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I carry wisdom and good judgment within me from all my wise choices

yoga.title: Balancing Poses for Trust
yoga.instruction: Practice balancing poses to build trust in your body and abilities.
yoga.affirmation: I trust my balance and ability to stay centered in challenges
